alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 3:12AM EDT until April 09 at 12:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19 affecting Talbot, Upson, Taylor and Crawford Counties. Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Jones, Houston, Bibb, Monroe and Twiggs Counties. Oconee River near Oconee affecting Wilkinson, Washington and Johnson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and will continue. * WHERE...Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19. * WHEN...From early this morning to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24 feet, Minor flooding expands further into the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 19. The flood waters will be up to 6 feet deep over the top of the boat ramp and cover a portion of the access road by the bridge on the Taylor County side of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 23.2 feet rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.8 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 18 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
